Title: The red flower of Dazhai blossoms everywhere
Designer: Literacy Office of the Political Work Group of the Revolutionary Committee of Shanxi Province (山西省革命委员会政工组文教办公室)
Publisher: Shanxi renmin chubanshe (山西人民出版社)
Notes: As the Cultural Revolution unfurled, only one person and one type of publications became acceptable: Mao and his writings. Rural model communes such as Dazhai (and industrial models like Daqing) could only exist because they were inspired by Mao Thought and Mao actively supported them.
Theme: Study DazhaiTo Read Too Many Books is Harmful
